SEARCH
Package com.app.game.service.impl

Class QuestServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.app.game.service.impl.QuestServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
QuestService<DifficultyLevel>
@Service public class QuestServiceImpl extends Object implements QuestService<DifficultyLevel>
Service implementation for managing quests in the game.

This class provides methods to add, remove, find, save quests, generate random quests, and calculate points based on player answers.
